name: Big Bang
description: The universe begins (~13.8 billion years ago)

name: First Stars Form
description: The first generation of stars ignite (~13.6 billion years ago)

name: First Galaxies
description: Galaxies begin to form and cluster (~13.2 billion years ago)

name: Milky Way Forms
description: Our galaxy takes shape (~13 billion years ago)

name: Solar System Forms
description: Our sun and planets form (~4.6 billion years ago)

name: Earth Forms
description: Planet Earth forms from cosmic dust (~4.5 billion years ago)

name: First Life
description: Simple single-celled organisms appear (~3.8 billion years ago)

name: Photosynthesis
description: Cyanobacteria begin producing oxygen (~2.5 billion years ago)

name: Complex Cells
description: Eukaryotic cells with nuclei evolve (~2 billion years ago)

name: Multicellular Life
description: First multicellular organisms (~600 million years ago)

name: Cambrian Explosion
description: Rapid diversification of life forms (~540 million years ago)

name: First Fish
description: Vertebrates appear in the oceans (~530 million years ago)

name: Plants on Land
description: First plants colonize dry land (~470 million years ago)

name: Insects Appear
description: First insects evolve (~400 million years ago)

name: Amphibians
description: First animals leave the water (~370 million years ago)

name: First Forests
description: Large forests cover the land (~360 million years ago)

name: Reptiles Evolve
description: First reptiles appear (~320 million years ago)

name: Age of Dinosaurs
description: Dinosaurs dominate the Earth (~230 million years ago)

name: Flowering Plants
description: First flowering plants evolve (~130 million years ago)

name: Dinosaur Extinction
description: Asteroid impact ends dinosaur reign (~66 million years ago)

name: Early Primates
description: First primates evolve (~55 million years ago)

name: Homo Habilis
description: First tool-using human ancestor (~2.4 million years ago)

name: Homo Erectus
description: First human ancestor to leave Africa (~1.9 million years ago)

name: Neanderthals
description: Neanderthals appear in Europe (~400,000 years ago)

name: Homo Sapiens
description: Modern humans appear in Africa (~300,000 years ago)

name: Cave Paintings
description: Earliest known cave art (~40,000 years ago)

name: Last Ice Age Ends
description: Climate warms, enabling agriculture (~12,000 years ago)

name: Agriculture
description: Humans begin farming (~10,000 years ago)

name: Pyramids Built
description: Great Pyramid of Giza constructed (~4,500 years ago)

name: Civilization
description: First cities and writing (~5,000 years ago)

name: Classical Antiquity
description: Greek and Roman civilizations (~2,500 years ago)

name: Birth of Jesus Christ
description: Beginning of the Common Era (~2,000 years ago)

name: Scientific Revolution
description: Modern science begins (~400 years ago)

name: Declaration of Independence
description: United States founded (~250 years ago)

name: Industrial Revolution
description: Steam power and factories (~200 years ago)

name: Modern Era
description: Electricity, computers, space travel (~100 years ago)
